LanguageData.Diary_Directory_Not_Found:
Error during export : folder path doesn't exist.
Please create the folder or edit folder path in mod settings.
LanguageData.Diary_Error_During_Export:
Error during export : an error happened.
Please check write access to the folder are correct or edit folder path in mod settings.
LanguageData.Diary_File_Created_Available_At: File is available at this path
LanguageData.Diary_Default_Log_Filter: Default log filter in Diary tab
LanguageData.Diary_Log_Writer_Filter_Explanation: Diary can write automatically logs in the Diary. You just have to set the next option to the logs which must be written automatically.
LanguageData.Diary_Connected_To_Progress_Renderer: Diary is correctly connected to Progress Renderer.
LanguageData.Diary_Not_Connected_To_Progress_Renderer: Diary is not connected to Progress Renderer. If Progress Renderer is enabled, you have to place it before Diary.
LanguageData.Diary_Edit_Screenshot_Folder_Explanation:
You can change the images folder used by Diary. It will move images files if exists, or simply edit paths in memory if not.
This is only a modification for Diary. You have also to edit mod configuration for ProgressRenderer.
LanguageData.Diary_Use_Current_Hour_When_Adding_Event: Use the current game hour when you add an event in the Diary.
